author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
This PR includes https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38736 and Nano-related code in FastSim sequence.

#### PR validation:
Run the following configs our from `runTheMatrix` give expected results:
`runTheMatrix.py --what upgrade -l 13234.0,13434.0,13240.303  -t 8 --wm init`

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:
None.
title: [Draft] Add NANO step and Mini+Nano validations in FastSim
